title: InstantCrypto
description: Pairing cryptocurrency data with recent and relevant news articles related to a specific cryptocurrency

title: Lets Go Somewhere
description: A site to find new places to visit and post about places you would like to go to

title: Book Search Engine
description: A fully functioning Google Books API search engine built with a RESTful API, and refactor it to be a GraphQL API built with Apollo Server.

title: Password Generator
description: An application that enables employees to generate random passwords based on selected criteria

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Using the OpenWeather One Call API retrieve weather data for cities display the current forecast and a five day forecast

title: Live Daily Schedule
description: To create a simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour
